trans-unit.source: Represents a node in the **SharePoint Connections** hierarchy of nodes in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 表示服务器资源管理器中节点的“SharePoint 连接”层次结构中的节点。

trans-unit.source: You can get an <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode> object when you create an extension for a SharePoint node, or when you define a new type of node.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode>对象创建的 SharePoint 节点中，扩展或在定义新类型的节点时。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Extend a SharePoint Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md) and [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md)和[如何： 向服务器资源管理器中添加自定义 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> objects that are the children of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为当前节点的子节点的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> objects that are the children of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 集合<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" />对象的当前节点的子对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeContext" /> object that you can use to get information about the SharePoint site that the current node is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeContext" /> 对象，它可用来获取有关当前节点所关联的 SharePoint 网站的信息。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeContext" /> object that you can use to get information about the SharePoint site that the current node is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用来获取有关当前节点所关联 SharePoint 网站信息的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeContext" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeContext> object to execute SharePoint commands that call into the SharePoint server object model, get the URL of the SharePoint site, and to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeContext>对象以执行 SharePoint 命令该调入 SharePoint 服务器对象模型时，获取的 URL 的 SharePoint 站点，并执行其他任务。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the node is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在双击节点时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前节点的图标。

trans-unit.source: The icon for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 当前节点的图标。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the node is recreated every time its parent node is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否每次刷新其父节点时重新创建该节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the node is recreated every time its parent node is refreshed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果每次刷新其父节点时; 重新创建该节点否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeType" /> object that defines the behavior of this node.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeType" /> 对象，用于定义此节点的行为。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeType" /> object that defines the behavior of this node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeType" />对象，用于定义此节点的行为。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent node for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前节点的父节点。

trans-unit.source: The parent node for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 当前节点的的父节点。 的

trans-unit.source: Updates the text displayed by the node and recreates its dynamic child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 更新由节点显示的文本，并重新创建动态子节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service provider for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前节点的服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a service provider.
trans-unit.target: 表示服务提供程序的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is used to sort the current node among sibling nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于将当期节点在同级节点之间排序。

trans-unit.source: A value that is used to sort the current node among sibling nodes.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，用于对当前节点的同级节点之间进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Nodes are first sorted by their <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode.SortOrder%2A> property, then by their <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 节点首先按排序其<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode.SortOrder%2A>属性，然后按其<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode.Text%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置节点的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text of the node.
trans-unit.target: 节点的文本。
